1050890.name: Lawless Lands Developer Toolkit DLC
1050890.description:
Lawless Lands

Over 500 ready-to-use assets.

Developer Toolkit DLC:
  • Custom Sprites - Use Sprites Directly From Lawless Lands In Your Projects!
  • Custom Sound Effects - Use Sound Effects Directly From Lawless Lands In Your Projects!
  • Custom Items - Use Item Sprites From Lawless Lands In Your Projects!
  • Custom Scripts - Use Some Scripts From Lawless Lands In Your Very Own Projects!
  • Custom GCH Files - Use The Building Blocks For Game Character Hub Made Specifically For Lawless Lands In Your Own Projects!

NOTE: In order to use this DLC, you must have an RPG Maker application or similar tool!
